product_name: Amphipod Xinglet Flash LED Reflective Vest
long_description: Great for in-city running, biking and walking, the Amphipod Xinglet Flash LED reflective vest keeps you visible to oncoming traffic. Red LEDs on the front and back flash to catch the attention of motorists; operates with a simple on/off push button on the front. Reflective hits on the shoulder straps and waistband help you be seen from any angle. Fully adjustable straps with stretch material let you customize the fit for wearing the vest over layers; clips in the front allow easy on and off. Amphipod Xinglet Flash LED reflective vest has an airy construction that won't trap sweat. Operates on small, lightweight, easy-to-replace CR2032 coin batteries, included.
short_description: Great for in-city running, biking and walking, the Amphipod Xinglet Flash LED reflective vest keeps you visible to oncoming traffic.
